channel.title: Need help with baning!
channel.description:
ok there has been alot of people using ::noclip an::setitem i was wondering if it possible to make so when they use this command that it kicks them an auto bans them is that possible ?if it is please help me i belive legionscape has some auto ban :confused:
p.s. got pimpscape source

item.title: Need help with baning!
item.dc:creator: @captian_blk captian blk
item.description:

kk blake dont worry i got it an it works = ] thank you endurance

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with baning!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Alright, in PimpScape, there should be a ::banuser command, where you type the name of the player after the ::banuser thing. You must, however, be an admin.
To ban a player named “fluffy”, you would need to type ::banuser fluffy
If you need any more help, just post here.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with baning!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

I’m at school right now, but if I were at home, I’d give you the code. I can’t write up and test out stuff. Also, what source are you using? because some source engines are different, and there some dont have the appendtoBanned() void. Tell me what source you’re using, and I’ll see what I can do when I get home.

Read full topic

ok m8 go to the tut section you will find anything you need to ban people on your server

search for this on the tut section (hate noobs who try to ::cat,::noclip::setitem?
